mapper.select: select mgender as sex, count(*) as mcnt FROM member group by mgender order by 1
select to_char(odate, 'yy/mm/dd') as odate, sum(ototal) as total from orderlist where to_char(odate, 'yymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(current_date-7,'yy/mm/dd') group by to_char(odate, 'yy/mm/dd') order by 1
select c.clarge as cat, count(*) as ccnt from orderitem o join category c on o.pcode = c.pcode GROUP BY c.clarge order by 1
